name: Qingque
story: Diviner of the Divination Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu, and a librarian.Always slacks off and is about to be demoted to a "door guardian."

skills.name: Flower Pick
skills.description: Tosses a tile to deal minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: A Scoop of Moon
skills.description: Draws tiles and increases DMG dealt. This turn does not end after this action.

skills.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to all enemies, then obtains 4 tiles of the same suit.

skills.name: Celestial Jade
skills.description: At the start of any ally's turn, draws a tile. At the start of this character's turn, if this character holds 4 tiles from the same suit, remove all tiles in possession and Enhance this Basic ATK while increasing this character's ATK.

skills.name: Game Solitaire
skills.description: After they use their Technique, draw tile(s) at the start of the next battle.

skills.name: Cherry on Top!
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and minor Quantum DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

eidolons.name: Sleep on the Tiles
eidolons.description: Every time Draw Tile is triggered, Qingque immediately regenerates 1 Energy.

eidolons.name: Read Between the Tiles
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Right on the Tiles
eidolons.description: After this character's Skill is used, there is a 24% fixed chance to gain Self-Sufficer, which lasts until the end of the current turn. With Self-Sufficer, using Basic ATK or Enhanced Basic ATK immediately launches 1 follow-up attack on the same target, dealing Quantum DMG equal to 100% of the previous Basic ATK (or Enhanced Basic ATK)'s DMG.

eidolons.name: Gambit for the Tiles
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Prevail Beyond the Tiles
eidolons.description: Recovers 1 Skill Point after using Enhanced Basic ATK.
